title: Likening Isaiah 34 unto Ourselves
html: Isa. 34 applies directly to our time, the last days, because the prophecies in that chapter will occur when the Lord comes in his glory to the earth. Some of our generation may witness the slaughter of the wicked, as described in 34:1-8, or we may see the burning of the earth, as set forth in 34:9-15; 34:16-17 alludes to the blessings of eternal marriage.
